/opt/local/bin/c++    -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/eggboxC++.dir/eggbox.cc.o  -o /u/rbentley/MultiNest/bin/eggboxC++  /u/rbentley/MultiNest/lib/libmultinest_mpi.3.10.dylib -framework Accelerate /opt/local/lib/openmpi-mp/libmpi_usempif08.dylib /opt/local/lib/openmpi-mp/libmpi_usempi_ignore_tkr.dylib /opt/local/lib/openmpi-mp/libmpi_mpifh.dylib /opt/local/lib/openmpi-mp/libmpi.dylib
